title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for zero slopes

1 point is earned for nonzero slopes
descriptions:

1 point is earned for zero slopes

1 point is earned for nonzero slopes

The student response earns one of the following points:

1 point is earned for zero slopes

1 point is earned for nonzero slopes

The student response earns all of the following points:

1 point is earned for nonzero slopes

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
